appShowcase.title: Shopify Collection Slider Section
appShowcase.description: Showcase your product collections in a smooth, horizontal slider layout. This section helps customers explore featured collections, new arrivals, or bestsellers in an engaging and visually balanced way without cluttering your storefront.

ctaButton.text: Contact us to add this section

mainContent.heading: What is the Collection Slider Section?
paragraphs: The Collection Slider section allows you to display Shopify collections in a horizontal, scrollable layout that enhances product discovery.
It creates a smooth browsing experience by presenting collections in an interactive carousel, helping customers explore more without overwhelming the page.
This section fits seamlessly into any storefront and works well for highlighting featured collections, promotions, or seasonal categories.
